aboutMe.spanFirst: As a frontend developer from Rust, I am passionate about developing appealing web applications.
aboutMe.spanSecond: I am available both on site and remotely - depending on requirements.
aboutMe.spanThird: I attach great importance to constantly developing myself, taking on new challenges and turning ideas into functioning and user-friendly products.
aboutMe.spanFourth: I look forward to exchanging ideas with you - perhaps an exciting project will arise!

skillSet.spanFirst: In my projects, I have worked with various front-end technologies and have continuously learned new concepts. As web development is constantly evolving, I remain curious and open to new tools and methods.
skillSet.spanSecond: Let me know! I'm always open to learning new things and broadening my horizons.

featuredProjects.spanFirst: Discover a selection of my work here. Interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

Join.content: This application is a task manager based on the Kanban system. Create and organize tasks using the drag-and-drop functionality and assign users and categories.

elPolloLoco.content: In this jump-and-run game, which was realized with object-oriented programming, Pepe Peligroso fights against a group of crazy chickens. Join him and support him in this adventure!

daBubble.content: Based on Slack, this app offers a user-friendly platform for optimizing team communication. Real-time messages and a structured channel organization make communication within the team noticeably easier.

recencies.title: What my colleagues say about me
recencies.firstRecency: Simon's involvement in our Join group project was very refreshing and enriching, as he was always on hand when there was a problem and also persistently worked towards a solution. Even if you needed support, you could just ask him and he would take the time to answer your questions.
recencies.secondRecency: I had the pleasure of working with Simon on our joint project. He was always reliable and actively involved in all tasks. I was particularly impressed by how quickly he picked up new concepts and technologies. Simon is a very valuable partner who always approached us and was instrumental in helping us achieve our goal.

contact.spanFirst: Please feel free to use the contact form to send me a message. I look forward to learning more about your ideas and supporting your project. Do you need support in the frontend area? Let's talk about it!

contactFormular.thirdInputPlaceholder: Hello Simon, I am interested in...
contactFormular.firstInputError: Oops! It seems your name is missing
contactFormular.thirdInputError: It seems like the message is missing
contactFormular.legalNoticeMessage: I have read the privacy policy and agree to the processing of my data as stated.
